Wonky Sprout OS

MORNING TRANSITION CHECKLIST

Use this checklist daily to execute the Morning Transition Protocol (6:00-7:00 AM).

Print this page or check boxes directly in your browser (progress saves automatically).

PHASES

- [ ] **6:00-6:02 AM** - Wake immediately (no snooze) - [ ] **6:00-6:02 AM** - Drink 16 oz water - [ ] **6:02-6:03 AM** - Take pills from organizer - [ ] **6:03-6:10 AM** - Complete movement protocol (walk/stretch/exercise/shower) - [ ] **6:10-6:15 AM** - Make and drink coffee/tea (no multitasking)
- [ ] **6:15-6:20 AM** - Clear Command Center of clutter - [ ] **6:15-6:20 AM** - Arrange essential tools (water, headphones, pill organizer, notebook, phone) - [ ] **6:15-6:20 AM** - Adjust lighting and temperature - [ ] **6:20-6:25 AM** - Close all tabs and apps from yesterday - [ ] **6:20-6:25 AM** - Open only: Calendar, Google Tasks, primary work app - [ ] **6:20-6:25 AM** - Set phone to Do Not Disturb - [ ] **6:20-6:25 AM** - Turn off computer notifications - [ ] **6:25-6:30 AM** - Put on headphones (Profile 1.0 or 2.0 based on mode) - [ ] **6:25-6:30 AM** - Test audio and adjust for comfort
- [ ] **6:30-6:35 AM** - Review today's calendar - [ ] **6:30-6:35 AM** - Identify time blocks available for deep work - [ ] **6:30-6:35 AM** - Identify high-risk times (back-to-back meetings, sensory-heavy events) - [ ] **6:30-6:35 AM** - Add missing essentials (meals, buffers, breaks) - [ ] **6:35-6:42 AM** - Open Google Tasks and categorize by urgency - [ ] **6:35-6:42 AM** - Select 3 Priority Tasks for today - [ ] **6:35-6:42 AM** - Assign Priority Tasks to specific time blocks - [ ] **6:35-6:42 AM** - Note first micro-action for each Priority Task - [ ] **6:42-6:45 AM** - Close eyes and visualize starting first Priority Task - [ ] **6:42-6:45 AM** - Take 3 deep breaths - [ ] **6:42-6:45 AM** - Say out loud: "I am ready to execute [FIRST TASK]"
### Pre-Launch Check (6:45-6:50 AM) - [ ] Water bottle is full - [ ] Headphones are on and comfortable - [ ] Phone is on Do Not Disturb - [ ] Only necessary tabs/apps are open - [ ] I know my first Priority Task - [ ] I know the first micro-action for that task - [ ] I have time blocked for this task - [ ] I feel physically comfortable (temperature, not hungry) ### First Micro-Action (6:50-6:55 AM) - [ ] **6:50 AM** - Set timer for 5 minutes - [ ] **6:50-6:55 AM** - Execute ONLY the first micro-action - [ ] **6:55 AM** - Assess: Do I want to keep going? ### Momentum Lock (6:55-7:00 AM) - [ ] Set timer for 25 minutes (Pomodoro block) - [ ] Continue working on Priority Task - [ ] Ignore everything else until timer ends
- ‚úì Started day at 6:00 AM (not 7:00 AM or later) - ‚úì Completed all 4 phases without major skips - ‚úì Launched into first Priority Task by 7:00 AM - ‚úì Feel physically awake, mentally clear, ready to execute
